channel.title: Help With Changing What A spell says
channel.description: Well i added veangance and i used chargei want it to say veangance instead and iwnat to change the text under it but i'm not sure how cna someone help please

you should, when you go to client.java and search for charge, about the third or fourth one will be the spells and their names. in there just change the name and save, compile then run
